description.narrative: The main objective of the ihmisoikeudet.net project is to safeguard the right of everyone to receive human rights education. Human rights education is an important form of global education. The project's core function is human rights education and training . Human rights education includes all kind of upbringing education training and information that aims to the respect and fulfillment of human rights and fundamental rights and to the prevention of human rights violations. Ihmisoikeudet.net seeks to secure the right of everyone to receive human rights education by informing of the universal human rights via the ihmisoikeudet.net website and by targeted trainings. The main target groups of the project are teachers and teacher students. The content of the huma n rights-based development policy is the basis for Ihmisoikeudet.net website. Human rights education aims to a holistic perception of the world it opens up ways to deal with issues related to development and justice and it guides towards global responsibil ity. The project?s key material has been produced with the support of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs Communications and Global Education aid.The website will be developed communicatively and pedagogically during 2015 ? 2016. The existing material on the website will be updated and it will be bound to the new basic education curriculum (OPS) which will come into force in 2016. The aim is that the updating of the site allows it to serve teachers and teacher students better. The project?s aim is that teacher s and teacher students will have more knowledge about human rights and they will have more capacity for carrying out human rights education in their own class rooms.
